# rafay Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    rafay = {
      version = ">= 0.1"
      source  = "registry.terraform.io/RafaySystems/rafay"
    }
  }
}

provider "rafay" {
  provider_config_file = "/Users/user1/oraganization-user@rafay.co.json"
}
```

### Optional

- `ignore_insecure_tls_error` (Boolean)
- `provider_config_file` (String)
